messageBody:
--- Chris Morris <chrismo@...> wrote:
> Don't you also need a fail("no exception thrown")
> inside the try after
> the call to findArticleById? Otherwise, if no
> exception is thrown, this
> test still passes.

Yes, I need a fail. I forgot it in the code example.
